mysterious individual or group of
individuals who in October 2017 started
posting online updates about secret
actions allegedly taken by the Trump
administration all to purge corruption
from the world most of the mainstream
news outlets have written cue off as a
conspiracy theory but the constant
stream of anti Trump coverage have
damaged these outlets credibility with
